item.title: Got some questions!
item.dc:creator: @kirill113 kirill113
item.description:
@kirill113 wrote:

yes i haw an antilag the cfg and the java what now it wont help[br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2007, 09:13:27 AM[/size][hr]i mean like how to turn it on ?
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2007, 09:50:15 AM[/size][hr]This is all what i haw in antilag.java

[code]
// This resets server every 30 mins to stop lag - xerozcheez
import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 99999999)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “runserver.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2007, 09:54:22 AM[/size][hr]…[br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2007, 01:05:46 PM[/size][hr]any one gona post something here

Read full topic
